name: Shipping
description: Assessment of international maritime shipping involvement including tankers, bulk cargo carriers, and container ships. Excludes inland waterways, passenger transport, and dredging activities.
field: tankers, bulk cargo carriers, container ships, international shipping, critical navigation routes for international shipping

Q1.text: Is the client, through their activity, linked to the international maritime shipping industry?
Q1.summary: Shipping Involvement Verification - Is the client linked to international maritime shipping industry?

Q2.text: Is the client solely involved in operating predominantly on inland waterways, canals and/or rivers?

Q3.text: Is the client solely involved in transporting passengers on ferries, cruise ships or ocean liners?

Q4.text: Is the client solely involved in undertaking dredging and deep sea vessel activities?

Q5.text: Is the client involved in transportation of wet and/or dry goods/products via tankers, bulk cargo carriers, or container ships?
Q5.summary: Shipping Type Verification - Tankers, bulk cargo, or container ships involvement

Q6.text: Does the client have direct engagement with the shipping operations (owning, operating, chartering, or managing vessels)?
Q6.summary: Direct Engagement - Direct operational involvement in shipping

Q7.text: Does the client hold an executive management or board of directors position in the shipping business?
Q7.summary: Substantial Connection - Executive or board position

Q8.text: Does the income from the shipping-related activity represent more than 10% of the client's total income?
Q8.summary: Substantial Connection - Income threshold for direct engagement (>10%)

Q9.text: Does the client have indirect involvement with shipping (providing specialist equipment, leasing port facilities, investing in shipping companies, or providing maritime services)?
Q9.summary: Indirect Engagement - Supporting services or investments

Q10.text: Does the income from the shipping-related activity represent more than 25% of the client's total income?
Q10.summary: Substantial Connection - Income threshold for indirect engagement (>25%)

Q1_NO.reason: Client is not linked to international maritime shipping industry

Q2_YES.reason: Activity solely involves inland waterways, canals and/or rivers - not considered SIAP

Q3_YES.reason: Activity solely involves passenger transport (ferries, cruise ships, ocean liners) - not considered SIAP

Q4_YES.reason: Activity solely involves dredging and deep sea vessel activities - not considered SIAP

Q5_NO.reason: Client not involved in tankers, bulk cargo carriers, or container ships

Q7_YES.reason: Direct shipping engagement with executive/board position requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q8_YES.reason: Direct shipping engagement with income >10% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q8_NO.reason: Direct shipping engagement but income <=10% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence

Q9_NO.reason: No direct or indirect shipping engagement identified

Q10_YES.reason: Indirect shipping engagement with income >25% requires Enhanced Due Diligence

Q10_NO.reason: Indirect shipping engagement but income <=25% - SIAP without Enhanced Due Diligence
